alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Brule; Charles Mix (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 11:58PM MDT until September 21 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Aurora County in south central South Dakota... Northwestern Charles Mix County in south central South Dakota... Southern Brule County in south central South Dakota... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1258 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles southwest of Grass Ranch Colony, or 18 miles southwest of Kimball, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grass Ranch Colony around 115 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
